item.description:
Hi ladies,

We had such a wonderful time at Jake and JOES and I am back on track with my once monthly meet ups!

I suggest that we play it by ear and see what the weather brings in terms of where we decide to settle down in Marina Bay.  There are plenty of places to choose from with both indoor and outdoor seating.

As always- I ask that you PLEASE update your RSVP prior to the event so that I can make an appropriate reservation.  Unfortunately, 6 women did not do this for the last meet up and I wound up with an incomplete reservation and wasting time and space at the restaurant.  I cannot stress how much of an inconvenience this is.  Please respect your membership and the rest of the group and rsvp appropriately.

Okay- I am getting off the soap box....just had to get that out:-)

Let's make this another wonderful night out ladies!  As always, the more new faces the better!!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: As the date nears I will suggest a meeting place (inside or out) depending on weather
item.name: Let's hit Marina Bay while the weather is still nice!!
